website_summaries.verdict: This fish oil supplement is formulated with wild-caught Alaskan salmon oil, containing 2,000 milligrams of oil per serving and 17 omega fatty acids.
pros: Fish oil can help support heart, eye, brain, and joint health and may reduce the risk of heart disease
Free of additional filler fish like cod liver, krill, or farmed fish
cons: As can be common with fish oil supplements, some users experience a fishy taste or fishy-smelling intestinal gas

customer_reviews.title: Helps with Dry skin and PLME / Jaw stiffness
customer_reviews.text: I started taking these as I have very dry skin and I was just diagnosed with PMLE (Polymorphous light eruption - Sun Allergy) with dry skin it makes the PMLE worse. Within a week I noticed my skin is much softer and I feel more comfortable in my own skin. A bonus, I have a really tight jaw usually and I have noticed that has subsided as well! I can't wait to see what else it helps with as I am only a week in. I do wish these were vegetarian capsules though. I hope they switch to Vcaps at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great brand and great product
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but excellent quality. Probably worth the investment. I’ve always liked this brand and had positive results. I take this to help heart health, to reduce inflammation and also mood stabilization. I would recommend this and will continue to purchase myself.
customer_reviews.author: M Bear

customer_reviews.title: Best Fish Oil Out There!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking this since my fertility doctor recommended it. I’ve noticed a huge change in my medical lab results since taking it. I always take it at night to avoid the fish burps (which rarely happens). Overall this is the only fish oil I will ever take from now on due to its purity.
customer_reviews.author: JJS

customer_reviews.title: Finally, A Real Fish Oil Supplement That Works
customer_reviews.text: I use these daily. They are a little big for pills, but they don't give me any issues. Make sure to follow the directions by taking them with meals. If not your stomach will make weird contractions. No pain or anything, just something I noticed when taken on an empty stomach. No fishy taste or smell either. No fish burps. Will be buying again.

Sure I will keep ordering them if she continues to use them

product_meta.title: New Chapter Wholemega Fish Oil Supplement - Wild Alaskan Salmon Oil with Omega-3 + Astaxanthin + Sustainably Caught - 180 Count (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description:
Size:180 Count (Pack of 1)New Chapter's Wholemega Fish Oil Supplements have been clinically shown to improve the Omega 3 Index in just 2 weeks. Wholemega Salmon Oil delivers 17 Omega fatty acids (including vital Omega 3s) and naturally occurring Vitamin D3. Contains 100% sustainably caught Wild Alaskan Salmon to help solve the severe environmental problems caused by typical overfishing and ocean trawling. Made with Non GMO Project Verified salmon oil: No krill oil, no anchovies or sardines, no cod liver oil, no exploited fisheries, no farmed fish. (Packaging May Vary)

*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
feature_bullets: Wholemega Fish Oil is clinically shown to retain healthy triglyceride levels and improve the Omega 3 Index in just two weeks
4 in 1 Benefits: Heart, joint, eye, and brain support with 2000 mg of oil per serving including vital Omega 3s DHA & EPA
Good for You, Good for the Ocean: Wild-caught Salmon oil is 100% from Alaska, where sustainable fishing is state law; No overfishing, no bottom trawling, no wasted catch
Extra virgin fish oil supplement is fresh pressed for optimal absorption, capturing salmon’s whole-food profile of 17 Omega fatty acids, Vitamin D3 and Astaxanthin

100% Wild Salmon Oil from Certified Responsible Alaska Fisheries, NSF Certified, Gluten Free, Made with Non-GMO Project Verified Salmon Oil, No High Heat Processing, No Artificial Flavors, No Sugar or Sweeteners (added to some fish oil gummies), No Farmed Fish, No Krill Oil, No Cod Liver Oil (Packaging May Vary)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
